oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Civil Defense display in Giant Supermarket
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Civil Defense display in Giant Supermarket. They are recommending the groceries needed for one person to survive 14 days. Shows Carnation canned milk, pork and beans, Pepsi-Cola, Campbell's Soups, and other items.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Food; Canned foods; Civil defense; Merchandise displays
